newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Meralco climbs 7.30 pct in early trade.
newsitem.headline: Meralco climbs 7.30 pct in early trade.

text.p: Manila Electric Co (Meralco) B shares rose by 10 pesos, or 7.30 percent, to 147 pesos in early Wednesday trade on foreign buying, traders said.
"It's playing catch up with the entire market especially after recent reports that foreigners can purchase A shares have been denied," said Cilette Liboro, research head at Orion-Squire Capital.
"The market's very selective but we see a lot of foreign buying on Meralco B," said Juanis Barredo, analyst at Citisecurities Inc.

Meralco B was the most heavily traded issue in early session. The stock was recently battered after reports, later denied, that foreigners would be allowed to buy A shares instead of being limited to class B shares.
